channel.title: setup on The Art of PostgreSQL
channel.description: Recent content in setup on The Art of PostgreSQL

item.title: Setting up psql, the PostgreSQL CLI
item.description: PostgreSQL ships with an interactive console with the command line tool named psql. It can be used both for scripting and interactive usage and is moreover quite a powerful tool. Interactive features includes autocompletion, readline support (history searches, modern keyboard movements, etc), input and output redirection, formatted output, and more.
